CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 26, 1955, pg. 21, reads: "Ready for Baseball - Curt Roberts, peppery Pittsburgh Pirates second baseman, who will be starting his second year with the local nine this summer, is shown packing his luggage prior to his departure for Florida and spring training Sunday.  Watching his father go through his chores is 'Butchie,' young son of the Robertses. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Pirates baseball player Curtis "Curt" Roberts, and his son "Butchie" Roberts, standing at edge of coffee table with suitcase, in living room
